_sText:
This is a revision of the map knas_rocktown_css by RunE. 
It was done after the Sbg. Clan asked me whether I would be able to edit the map and make a few changes, as the CTs had to many advantages.
I said I could, but would want RunEâ€™s permission. I contacted him and he gave me both the permission and the ressource files, so I did not even decompile the map.
Members of the Sbg. Clan and myself met on the Sbg. Clan server and discussed the spots we wanted to change. There are a few crates added in places where the terrorists desperatly needed cover, and so on.
I have to admit the map is now quite easy for the terrorists to win, especially if counter-terrorists still rely on their advantages, but the CT team can still win. In the end, it is fairer, we think.
 
All credit goes to RunE of course!
